IndexTermsPage.title: A Database Interface for File Up-dates.
IndexTermsPage.abstract: Database systems are concerned with structured data. Unfortunately, data is still often available in an unstructured manner (e.g., in files) even when it does have a strong internal structure (e.g., electronic documents or programs). In a previous paper
